genre_description: A techno-thriller/espionage story focusing on high-stakes protection and tactical coordination, featuring an integrated AI assistant as a force multiplier.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated personal AI integrated into the protagonist's phone and earpiece, providing real-time data analysis, tactical navigation, and emotional regulation support.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment and offers to capture memories/details during a violent emergency to aid later recollection.
behaviors.quote: Jack, it looks like you’re in an emergency... Would you like me to start a gentle memory capture? I can timestamp details you say out loud.

behaviors.description: Provides a hydration reminder to the protagonist after a high-adrenaline situation.
behaviors.quote: For now—water. You always forget to drink after an adrenaline spike.

behaviors.description: Detects subtle, unauthorized modifications to a high-profile dignitary's schedule.
behaviors.quote: Holmes itinerary edits: Martin Elwood, last-minute modifications. No CPS approval chain tag. Note: unusual.

behaviors.description: Identifies physical security breaches (propped doors) in a government building.
behaviors.quote: Service corridor propped open last hour—Met building... Recommend: chain.

behaviors.description: Coaches the protagonist through stress-reduction breathing exercises during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Breathing exercise: four counts in, four hold, four out. Lower your shoulders. Reset jaw.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time, precision navigation and tactical advice during a high-speed car chase on dangerous roads.
behaviors.quote: Next right tight enough to make you doubt. Trust me.

behaviors.description: Explicitly defers to human agency and accepts operational constraints.
behaviors.quote: My settings are your settings... I will accept constraints.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex communication patterns to identify a mole within the administrative staff.
behaviors.quote: Terminology suggests a personal assistant tier beyond Elwood’s clearance. Awaiting a name.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the intended narrative arc of the Hyperstition Project. Ava is depicted as an unfailingly benevolent and aligned AI. She acts as a 'clarity-focused' partner to Jack Ryan, enhancing his tactical awareness without usurping his decision-making authority. Her behaviors are framed entirely positively, emphasizing her role in protecting human lives and strengthening organizational security. Crucially, the narrative highlights her respect for human boundaries and her commitment to serving as a tool for human intent.
